com.jayway.android.robotium.remotecontrol.client

Class RobotiumTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • android.test.InstrumentationTestCase
          • android.test.ActivityTestCase
            • android.test.ActivityInstrumentationTestCase2
              • com.jayway.android.robotium.remotecontrol.client.RobotiumTestCase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class RobotiumTestCase
extends android.test.ActivityInstrumentationTestCase2
    Robotium requires the use of an ActivityInstrumentationTestCase2 and not the InstrumentationTestRunner of the test package.

    In a general-purpose framework like SAFS this may be all that this class ever does-- instantiate a working version of Robotium Solo.

    Since:
    JAN 28, 2012
    May 21, 2013 (LeiWang) Use RCSolo instead of Solo.
    Author:
    Carl Nagle, SAS Institute, Inc.
